message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to revolutionize your business.  While I can't disclose the exact details without a non-disclosure agreement, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.  This is a significant discount given its potential value. If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss further.  Otherwise, I will be selling it to another buyer for $800000.
